TextLibrary.Text: You escape the guards but not in time to save Serephine. She has been taken away; you are uncertain exactly where.
You will need Serephine with you to complete the quest in Enmouth.
As you enter Enmouth, you are ambushed by guards. They seem intent on capturing Princess Serephine.
This is where Serephine was taken from your party by Imperial Guards. Perhaps you can rescue her...
Princess Serephine has been removed from your party. You must try to get her back.
By the time you defeat the Imperial Guards, they have taken Serephine away; you are uncertain exactly where.
You must travel to Enmouth to help Princess Serephine's friend.
You must try to save Serephine from the Imperial Guards in Enmouth.
